mapper.sql: id, uid, wx_order_id, luck_draw_code, remark, status, create_time, update_time

nld.id as "id", nld.uid as "uid", nld.wx_order_id as "wxOrderId", nld.luck_draw_code as "luckDrawCode", nld.remark as "remark", nld.status as "status", date_format(nld.create_time, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createTime", date_format(nld.update_time, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as "updateTime"
mapper.delete:
update n_luck_draw nld set nld.status=2 WHERE 1=1
AND nld.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update n_luck_draw nld
nld.uid = #{uid},
nld.wx_order_id = #{wxOrderId},
nld.luck_draw_code = #{luckDrawCode},
nld.remark = #{remark},
nld.status = #{status},
nld.update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
where 1=1
and nld.id = #{id}
and nld.wx_order_id = #{wxOrderId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) total from n_luck_draw nld

SELECT COUNT(*) total from n_luck_draw nld INNER JOIN n_order no on nld.wx_order_id = no.wx_order_id INNER JOIN n_user nu on nld.uid = nu.id INNER JOIN n_dic nd on nld.luck_draw_code = dic_code where 1=1
nld.uid = #{uid}
